And<S>2532</S> I stood<S>2476</S> upon<S>1909</S> the sand<S>285</S> of the sea<S>2281</S>, and<S>2532</S> saw<S>1492</S> a beast<S>2342</S> rise up<S>305</S> out of<S>1537</S> the sea<S>2281</S>, having<S>2192</S> seven<S>2033</S> heads<S>2776</S> and<S>2532</S> ten<S>1176</S> horns<S>2768</S>, and<S>2532</S> upon<S>1909</S> his<S>846</S> horns<S>2768</S> ten<S>1176</S> crowns<S>1238</S>, and<S>2532</S> upon<S>1909</S> his<S>846</S> heads<S>2776</S> the name<S>3686</S> of blasphemy<S>988</S>. <sup>name: or, names</sup>
And<S>2532</S> the beast<S>2342</S> which<S>3739</S> I saw<S>1492</S> was<S>2258</S> like<S>3664</S> unto a leopard<S>3917</S>, and<S>2532</S> his<S>846</S> feet<S>4228</S> were as<S>5613</S> the feet of a bear<S>715</S>, and<S>2532</S> his<S>846</S> mouth<S>4750</S> as<S>5613</S> the mouth<S>4750</S> of a lion<S>3023</S>: and<S>2532</S> the dragon<S>1404</S> gave<S>1325</S> him<S>846</S> his<S>846</S> power<S>1411</S>, and<S>2532</S> his<S>846</S> seat<S>2362</S>, and<S>2532</S> great<S>3173</S> authority<S>1849</S>.
And<S>2532</S> I saw<S>1492</S> one<S>3391</S> of his<S>846</S> heads<S>2776</S> as it were<S>5613</S> wounded<S>4969</S> to<S>1519</S> death<S>2288</S>; and<S>2532</S> his<S>846</S> deadly<S>2288</S> wound<S>4127</S> was healed<S>2323</S>: and<S>2532</S> all<S>3650</S> the world<S>1093</S> wondered<S>2296</S> <S>2296</S> after<S>3694</S> <S>1722</S> the beast<S>2342</S>. <sup>wounded: Gr. slain</sup>
And<S>2532</S> they worshipped<S>4352</S> the dragon<S>1404</S> which<S>3739</S> gave<S>1325</S> power<S>1849</S> unto the beast<S>2342</S>: and<S>2532</S> they worshipped<S>4352</S> the beast<S>2342</S>, saying<S>3004</S>, Who<S>5101</S> is like<S>3664</S> unto the beast<S>2342</S>? who<S>5101</S> is able<S>1410</S> to make war<S>4170</S> with<S>3326</S> him<S>846</S>?
And<S>2532</S> there was given<S>1325</S> unto him<S>846</S> a mouth<S>4750</S> speaking<S>2980</S> great things<S>3173</S> and<S>2532</S> blasphemies<S>988</S>; and<S>2532</S> power<S>1849</S> was given<S>1325</S> unto him<S>846</S> to continue<S>4160</S> forty<S>5062</S> and two<S>1417</S> months<S>3376</S>. <sup>to continue: or, to make war</sup>
And<S>2532</S> he opened<S>455</S> his<S>846</S> mouth<S>4750</S> in<S>1519</S> blasphemy<S>988</S> against<S>4314</S> God<S>2316</S>, to blaspheme<S>987</S> his<S>846</S> name<S>3686</S>, and<S>2532</S> his<S>846</S> tabernacle<S>4633</S>, and<S>2532</S> them that dwell<S>4637</S> in<S>1722</S> heaven<S>3772</S>.
And<S>2532</S> it was given<S>1325</S> unto him<S>846</S> to make<S>4160</S> war<S>4171</S> with<S>3326</S> the saints<S>40</S>, and<S>2532</S> to overcome<S>3528</S> them<S>846</S>: and<S>2532</S> power<S>1849</S> was given<S>1325</S> him<S>846</S> over<S>1909</S> all<S>3956</S> kindreds<S>5443</S>, and<S>2532</S> tongues<S>1100</S>, and<S>2532</S> nations<S>1484</S>.
And<S>2532</S> all<S>3956</S> that dwell<S>2730</S> upon<S>1909</S> the earth<S>1093</S> shall worship<S>4352</S> him<S>846</S>, whose<S>3739</S> names<S>3686</S> are<S>1125</S> not<S>3756</S> written<S>1125</S> in<S>1722</S> the book<S>976</S> of life<S>2222</S> of the Lamb<S>721</S> slain<S>4969</S> from<S>575</S> the foundation<S>2602</S> of the world<S>2889</S>.
If any man<S>1536</S> have<S>2192</S> an ear<S>3775</S>, let him hear<S>191</S>.
He that<S>1536</S> leadeth<S>4863</S> into captivity<S>161</S> shall go<S>5217</S> into<S>1519</S> captivity<S>161</S>: he that<S>1536</S> killeth<S>615</S> with<S>1722</S> the sword<S>3162</S> must<S>1163</S> be killed<S>615</S> with<S>1722</S> the sword<S>3162</S>. Here<S>5602</S> is<S>2076</S> the patience<S>5281</S> and<S>2532</S> the faith<S>4102</S> of the saints<S>40</S>.
And<S>2532</S> I beheld<S>1492</S> another<S>243</S> beast<S>2342</S> coming up<S>305</S> out of<S>1537</S> the earth<S>1093</S>; and<S>2532</S> he had<S>2192</S> two<S>1417</S> horns<S>2768</S> like<S>3664</S> a lamb<S>721</S>, and<S>2532</S> he spake<S>2980</S> as<S>5613</S> a dragon<S>1404</S>.
And<S>2532</S> he exerciseth<S>4160</S> all<S>3956</S> the power<S>1849</S> of the first<S>4413</S> beast<S>2342</S> before<S>1799</S> him<S>846</S>, and<S>2532</S> causeth<S>4160</S> the earth<S>1093</S> and<S>2532</S> them which dwell<S>2730</S> therein<S>1722</S> <S>846</S> to<S>2443</S> worship<S>4352</S> the first<S>4413</S> beast<S>2342</S>, whose<S>3739</S> <S>846</S> deadly<S>2288</S> wound<S>4127</S> was healed<S>2323</S>.
And<S>2532</S> he doeth<S>4160</S> great<S>3173</S> wonders<S>4592</S>, so<S>2532</S> that<S>2443</S> he maketh<S>4160</S> fire<S>4442</S> come down<S>2597</S> from<S>1537</S> heaven<S>3772</S> on<S>1519</S> the earth<S>1093</S> in the sight<S>1799</S> of men<S>444</S>,
And<S>2532</S> deceiveth<S>4105</S> them that dwell<S>2730</S> on<S>1909</S> the earth<S>1093</S> by<S>1223</S> the means of those miracles<S>4592</S> which<S>3739</S> he<S>846</S> had power<S>1325</S> to do<S>4160</S> in the sight<S>1799</S> of the beast<S>2342</S>; saying<S>3004</S> to them that dwell<S>2730</S> on<S>1909</S> the earth<S>1093</S>, that they should make<S>4160</S> an image<S>1504</S> to the beast<S>2342</S>, which<S>3739</S> had<S>2192</S> the wound<S>4127</S> by a sword<S>3162</S>, and<S>2532</S> did live<S>2198</S>.
And<S>2532</S> he<S>846</S> had power<S>1325</S> to give<S>1325</S> life<S>4151</S> unto the image<S>1504</S> of the beast<S>2342</S>, that<S>2443</S> the image<S>1504</S> of the beast<S>2342</S> should<S>2980</S> both<S>2532</S> speak<S>2980</S>, and<S>2532</S> cause<S>4160</S> that as many as<S>3745</S> would<S>302</S> <S>4352</S> not<S>3361</S> worship<S>4352</S> the image<S>1504</S> of the beast<S>2342</S> should be killed<S>2443</S> <S>615</S>. <sup>life: Gr. breath</sup>
And<S>2532</S> he causeth<S>4160</S> all<S>3956</S>, both small<S>3398</S> and<S>2532</S> great<S>3173</S>,<S>2532</S> rich<S>4145</S> and<S>2532</S> poor<S>4434</S>,<S>2532</S> free<S>1658</S> and<S>2532</S> bond<S>1401</S>, to<S>2443</S> <S>846</S> receive<S>1325</S> a mark<S>5480</S> in<S>1909</S> their<S>846</S> right hand<S>1188</S> <S>5495</S>, or<S>2228</S> in<S>1909</S> their<S>846</S> foreheads<S>3359</S>: <sup>to receive: Gr. to give them</sup>
And<S>2532</S> that no<S>3363</S> man<S>5100</S> might<S>1410</S> buy<S>59</S> or<S>2228</S> sell<S>4453</S>, save he<S>1508</S> that had<S>2192</S> the mark<S>5480</S>, or<S>2228</S> the name<S>3686</S> of the beast<S>2342</S>, or<S>2228</S> the number<S>706</S> of his<S>846</S> name<S>3686</S>.
Here<S>5602</S> is<S>2076</S> wisdom<S>4678</S>. Let him that hath<S>2192</S> understanding<S>3563</S> count<S>5585</S> the number<S>706</S> of the beast<S>2342</S>: for<S>1063</S> it is<S>2076</S> the number<S>706</S> of a man<S>444</S>; and<S>2532</S> his<S>846</S> number<S>706</S> is Six hundred threescore and six<S>5516</S>.
